name: Rocket Jumping Sounds Dangerous
description:
Completed for the Finally finish something game jam. This is my first ever "completed" game and first ever completed jam. I would really benefit from any feedback, don't go easy. Thank you!

You play as a rocket jumping square who is trying to get to the fire because it's snowing and it's cold outside.  Shoot at your feet to jump high! Always remember to consider the angle of the mouse.

Controls:
LMB - Rocket Jump
A&D - left and right.

Recommended to play in full screen as it'll make it easier to aim.
